Before you buy this, don't expect this game to be fair. Don't come in thinking being the killer means you're the only one on the offensive, don't expect skill to mean you can survive over a minute, and definitely don't expect the other players to understand why you just happened to return to the hook at the perfect time. This cursed land is ruthless and painful for all who enter, but that's what makes the narrow escapes more thrilling and the total victories even more sweet. If playing pubs with scary people aren't your thing, no problem! Grab up to four friends and laugh at their pain.
oui

Un gioco pauroso a volte se non te la spetti. Come grafica e bella e il sistema di gioco molto semplice. E un po' difficile la prima volta che giochi, sicuramente farai schifo... ma po' di impegno ce la farai a diventare bravo. A parte alcuni bug del gioco che si trovano in giro (che dovrebbero risolvere) ma e giocabile. Mi piace molto questo gioco! sarebbe anche bello con i amici... ma io gioco da sola, ma mi diverto lo stesso. finora e un ottimo gioco per me...


A game sometimes scary if you're not up to it. Like graphics and beautiful and the game system very simple. And a little difficult the first time you play, surely you suck... but a little bit of effort on your part will make you become good. Apart from some bugs in the game that are found around (they have to solve) but is playable. I really like this game! it would also be nice with friends... but I play alone, but I enjoy it anyway. so far it's a great game for me...

Due to the new changes in ranks to grades and activating the SBMM system, the game is quite unplayable as of now. None of the matches are even fun anymore neither as survivor or as killer. If you're currently planning on buying Dead By Daylight: DON'T. For now, this game isn't worth your money, you should just wait for the SBMM to end.

After playing during the most recent updates I decided that my previous review does not hold true anymore. It was once a great game with great community, where I had fun on both sides - killers and survivors. Sadly, I can get only a crumble of that previous glory now and then.

Now playing a killer on high ranks means getting party groups that have no disruption in their communication whatsoever. They'll be doing gens while you're chasing, they'll be rescuing while you're defending gens. It's a high-stakes sport for them. In the endgame chat they will call you out on what crappy perks you run or for trying to play 'fair' without camping or tunneling by saying "ez" or "noob killer". That's basically what I get when trying to make the game fun for everyone.

At the same time, playing a survivor on relatively high ranks (10-1) with no party means getting the most negative experience with killers, which is really sad. The killers by no means can let anyone have fun. By not having communication you're at great disadvantage as a survivor. When you get hooked, the rest of the team will be trying to rescue you instead of doing generators, even if the killer is camping. I strongly believe that the best way to punish people playing this way - to quickly end the game by doing objectives. Instead, I saw numerous games where the camping killer gets all 4 kills and gets away with such playstyle with no penalty.

Everything I mentioned above is probably the developers and community to blame, but as for the gameplay aspect itself - it's unique and satisfying. Killers are well-designed and no matter how each individual game turns out, you get to play as some unique or iconic killers or survivors which is awesome.

So I cannot to not recommend this game, but had to outline the most problematic aspect of probably any online game - their communities.

We all play games to relax and have fun. Let's not rob other people of that right.

Death is not an escape?

Dead by Daylight - это...

когда тебя снимают с крюка в метре от маньяка.

когда ты по стэлсу чинишь генератор и тебе «помогают» 2-мя мисскликами со взрывами.

RAGEQUIT первого повешенного на крюк.

ливнувший маньяк в самом начале игры и -1 капля каждому.

когда выжившие бомбят на кемпера, вместо того, чтобы чинить генераторы и оставить маньяка без Очков Крови.

когда маньяк уже несёт второго к крюку, а первого в другой стороне не снимают. А если снимают, то мееееедленно, меееедленно идут к нему. Мало ли, вдруг там второй маньяк кемперит.

когда ты уже почти подошел к повешенному, а он, думая, что его бросили, перестает нажимать на пробел.

игра начинается с тремя выжившими.

поиск лобби, кик из лобби, слетающие сохранения, пинг 350+ и отсутствие официальных серверов в 2017.

когда тебя начинают лечить сразу же под крюком, а потом вы оба получаете пuзgы.

когда разработчики официально банят за фарм, но чинить баг с пропадающими в начале матча тиммейтами не собираются. Люди вынуждены фармить, чтобы не потерять каплю.


когда тебе пишут на стене -REP NOOB CAMPER @#$%
